effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.platinum: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
flavor_text.platinum: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
